DataElement.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Related Limb Edema Circumference Assessment Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the measurement of the circumference or girth of Kaposi Sarcoma related limb (extremity) edema.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Related Limb Edema Circumference Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to an assessment of the circumference (the size of something as given by the distance around it) of Kaposi Sarcoma (a malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells) related limb (a body region referring to an upper or lower extremity) edema (pathological transudate within one or more tissues).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin however, it may also occur internally.  It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).:Related; connected or associated.:A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity.:Pathological transudate within one or more tissues.(FMA)

Concepts.definition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin; however it may also occur internally. It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
A body region referring to an upper or lower extremity.
Accumulation of an excessive amount of fluid in cells or intercellular tissues.

Property.preferredDefinition:
The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of
something as given by the distance around it.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's anatomic organs.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: Move to caBIG context as teh preferred Rep class for Measurement
